description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nAgonizing Entrapment:
After this creature takes damage, the enemy is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SNARED} and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}. Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SNARED} take 50% more damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}. This trait does not stack.
name: Bloody Spike
